# [Interview #1162: Shadows of Self-San Jose, Entry #4](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1162#4)

#### Question

Calamity, it is talked about always being in the sky. Is is over North America or a global thing?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
